001
002import java.util.ArrayList;
003import java.util.List;
004
005/**
006 * lyric fetcher
007 *
008 * @author matecsaba
009 */
010public class lyrFetch {
011
012    /**
013     * the main
014     *
015     * @param args arguments
016     */
017    public static void main(String[] args) {
018        List<playerSong> need = playerSong.txt2pls(null, playerUtil.readup("need.pls"));
019        List<playerSong> done = new ArrayList<playerSong>();
020        List<playerSong> fail = new ArrayList<playerSong>();
021        List<playerSong> skip = new ArrayList<playerSong>();
022        for (int i = 0; i < need.size(); i++) {
023            if (playerUtil.keyPress()) {
024                break;
025            }
026            playerSong ntry = need.get(i);
027            switch (doSong(ntry)) {
028                case 0:
029                    done.add(ntry);
030                    break;
031                case 1:
032                    skip.add(ntry);
033                    break;
034                default:
035                    fail.add(ntry);
036                    break;
037            }
038        }
039        need.removeAll(skip);
040        need.removeAll(done);
041        playerUtil.put("--> need=" + need.size() + " skip=" + skip.size() + " done=" + done.size() + " fail=" + fail.size());
042        playerUtil.saveas(playerSong.pls2txt(need), "need.pls");
043        playerUtil.saveas(playerSong.pls2txt(done), "done.pls");
044        playerUtil.saveas(playerSong.pls2txt(fail), "fail.pls");
045        playerUtil.saveas(playerSong.pls2txt(skip), "skip.pls");
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * do one song
050     *
051     * @param song song to search
052     * @return 0 on success
053     */
054    public static int doSong(playerSong song) {
055        String cm[] = new String[3];
056        cm[0] = "./lyrFetch.sh";
057        cm[1] = song.justArtist();
058        cm[2] = song.justTitle();
059        playerUtil.put("--> song " + song.file + " : " + cm[1] + " - " + cm[2] + " <--");
060        playerLyric lyric = playerUtil.readup(song.lyrFile());
061        if (lyric != null) {
062            playerUtil.put("already exists!");
063            return 1;
064        }
065        if (cm[1].length() < 1) {
066            playerUtil.put("no artist!");
067            return 1;
068        }
069        if (cm[2].length() < 1) {
070            playerUtil.put("no title!");
071            return 1;
072        }
073        Process prc;
074        try {
075            Runtime rtm = Runtime.getRuntime();
076            prc = rtm.exec(cm);
077            prc.waitFor();
078        } catch (Exception e) {
079            playerUtil.put("failed to exec!");
080            return 2;
081        }
082        playerLyric res = playerUtil.doRead(prc.getInputStream());
083        if (res == null) {
084            playerUtil.put("failed to download!");
085            return 2;
086        }
087        res = res.clearScript();
088        if (res.size() < 1) {
089            playerUtil.put("got no lyrics!");
090            return 3;
091        }
092        playerUtil.saveas(res, song.lyrFile());
093        return 0;
094    }
095
096}
